subject: Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: The skiers had cut through a fresh dusting of snow, their skis hissing softly against the powder as they crisscrossed the slopes, then grinding to a halt at the icy base of the Sierra Summit resort in Huntington Lake, Calif., where Richard Shimizu was taking a break.
